sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card v-for="product in products" class="mx-auto" max-width="400">
        <v-img :src="products.image" height="200px"></v-img>
        <v-card-title>{{ products.name }}</v-card-title>
    </v-card>
</template>
<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            products: [],
        }
    },
    created() {
        this.fetchProducts();
    },
    methods: {
        async fetchProducts() {
            try {
                const response = await axios.get('http://localhost:3000/products');
                this.products = response.data;
            } catch (e) {
                console.error(e);
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>
